thread.title: Tara
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Tara

author: Tara
title: Tara
text: I couldn't be happier - after going to multiple stores who wouldn't set the opening of my mat to the size I wanted and still wanted to charge too much, I found Matboard. Customer service helped me set the right size, the ordering process was easy, and I received my mats in just a few days. They are absolutely perfect! Don't hesitate to order!
